Posts.Content: Run to another doctor! Get several opinions if necessary and trust your instincts. My sister was told by two doctors that her lumps were nothing to be concerned about. The third doctor discovered they were malignant. This doctor also found malignancies in some lymph nodes during surgery. She is now facing chemotherapy. Please don't wait six months as my sister did. Good luck!
Posts.Title: Scared and Confused
